content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on the market research I have conducted, I believe that a monthly rental price of 800 Euros would be fair and competitive. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate. Can you please lower the price?

Please note that I am a responsible and dependable tenant, and I would like to remain on good terms with my landlord.

I am not sure if I can afford 800 Euros per month, and I was wondering if there was any room for negotiation.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Of course, I am open to negotiation. Based on our discussion, I am willing to lower the monthly rental price to 750 Euros. This is still a fair and competitive price, and it should be within your budget. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.

Thank you for your understanding and flexibility. I will sign the lease and move in soon.

Please let me know if there is anything else I need to do in order to finalize the rental agreement.

Thank you again.

Best regards,
Maria
name: Maria Mamani

content: You're welcome, Maria. I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. In order to finalize the rental agreement, you will need to sign the lease and provide a security deposit of one month's rent. Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns. Thank you again for your interest in renting my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
